title: Poro Cupcakes
body:
They are too cute to even consider eating them. They were so fun and easy to make. Help me spread the cuteness of these little Poros everywhere.







Here is a list of ingredients I used to make these adorable Poros: 

-  Any cake mix works (preferably vanilla)
-  Vanilla icing to give it the white color
-  Sweetened Coconut shreds as the fur
-  Whole cashew nuts as the horns
-  Reese's Pieces, Smarties, M&M's are good options for the eyes
-  Cherry Laffy Taffy for their adorable big tongues

Remember to feed them Biscuits once you've made them  :) {{item:2054}}

replies.body: http://fc08.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2014/133/8/a/braum_poro_by_proxy_oq-d7i83tv.png
Amazingly cute and I approve of all themed novelty baked goods!  So tragic that the monster who would be so cruel as to eat these will be rewarded with tasty, tasty, cake! ;)
Thank you and I agree :) So far only a few have survived the monster, but I will do my best to save the rest :( lol

ive seen a lot of poro cupcakes but seriously the shredded coconut gives them that great furry look
love it
Thanks :D

Looks like Pantheon followed his dream and used the League for design ideas for his bakery shop

That seems to be coconut, laffy taffy, M&Ms, and cashews, all on one cupcake.

I am sure they taste as good as they look. I couldn't try one because I am not a murderer lol

That looks great! Pretty creative with the laffy taffy. If I made it I would probably substitute the coconut with something else.
Yes you could even white chocolate shavings :)
I guess that these aren't meant to be eaten, right OP?
Nobody better eat them.  o.o  Excellent work!

I need diz

Btw, what are the tongue & the rest made of? O.o
I used the Cherry Laffy Taffy as the tongue, the fur as sweetened coconut shreds, eyes as Reese's smarties, and the horns as Cashews :D Give it a try, so good and fun to make.
Ooh Adorable
Thank you :)

Are those cashews, m&m's,and laffy taffy?
I used Reese's Pieces but you can use M&M's if you want :)
